name: Just A 2D Platformer
description:
Hi! Welcome! Feel free the play the game and give me suggestions!
Since this is my first game, so there might be a lot of bugs.

Also, there are knife and grenade options below the machine gun option, since the weapon list is just a feature to let people to test the game, and it is not gonna be on the final project, so I am lazy to fix it:)
